mapper.insert: insert into user_coupon (login_name, coupon_id, start_time, end_time, created_time, exchange_code) value(#{loginName}, #{couponId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createdTime}, #{exchangeCode})
mapper.update: update user_coupon set login_name = #{loginName}, coupon_id = #{couponId}, loan_id = #{loanId}, used_time = #{usedTime}, expected_interest = #{expectedInterest}, actual_interest = #{actualInterest}, expected_fee = #{expectedFee}, actual_fee = #{actualFee}, default_interest = #{defaultInterest}, created_time = #{createdTime}, invest_id = #{investId}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}

select uc.* from user_coupon uc
JOIN coupon c on uc.coupon_id = c.id and c.coupon_type in
#{couponType}
where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS'

select uc.id as id, c.shared as shared, c.coupon_type as coupon_type, c.amount as coupon_amount, c.rate as rate, c.product_types as product_types, uc.end_time as end_time, (c.birthday_benefit + 1) as birthday_benefit, c.invest_lower_limit as invest_lower_limit, uc.status as status, c.user_group from user_coupon uc join coupon c on uc.coupon_id=c.id where (uc.status is null or uc.status != 'SUCCESS') and uc.end_time > now() and uc.login_name = #{loginName}

select uc.id as id, c.shared as shared, uc.start_time as start_time, uc.end_time as end_time, c.amount as coupon_amount, c.rate as rate, c.product_types as product_types, l.id as loan_id, l.product_type as loan_product_type, l.name as loan_name, c.coupon_type as coupon_type, i.amount as invest_amount, uc.used_time as used_time, uc.expected_interest - uc.expected_fee as expected_income, (c.birthday_benefit + 1) as birthday_benefit, c.invest_lower_limit as invest_lower_limit, uc.status as status, c.user_group from user_coupon uc join coupon c on uc.coupon_id=c.id join loan l on l.id=uc.loan_id join invest i on i.id = uc.invest_id where uc.status='SUCCESS' and uc.login_name = #{loginName} ORDER BY used_time DESC

select uc.id as id, c.coupon_type as coupon_type, c.amount as coupon_amount, c.rate as rate, c.product_types as product_types, uc.end_time as end_time, (c.birthday_benefit + 1) as birthday_benefit, c.invest_lower_limit as invest_lower_limit, uc.status as status, c.user_group from user_coupon uc join coupon c on uc.coupon_id=c.id where (uc.status is null or uc.status != 'SUCCESS') and uc.end_time < now() and uc.login_name = #{loginName}
select * from user_coupon where invest_id = #{investId} and status = 'SUCCESS'
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(i.`amount`), 0) FROM user_coupon t JOIN invest i ON t.`invest_id` = i.`id` WHERE t.`coupon_id` = #{couponId} AND t.`status` = 'SUCCESS'
select * from user_coupon where login_name = #{loginName} and coupon_id = #{couponId}
select t.* from user_coupon t join coupon m on t.coupon_id = m.id and m.coupon_type = 'BIRTHDAY_COUPON' where t.login_name = #{loginName} and t.invest_id = #{investId} and t.status = 'SUCCESS'

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.`actual_interest`- t.`actual_fee`), 0) FROM user_coupon t JOIN coupon c ON t.`coupon_id` = c.`id` WHERE t.`login_name` = #{loginName} AND t.`status` = 'SUCCESS' and c.`coupon_type` in ('INTEREST_COUPON','BIRTHDAY_COUPON','NEWBIE_COUPON','INVEST_COUPON');

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.`actual_interest`- t.`actual_fee`), 0) FROM user_coupon t JOIN coupon c ON t.`coupon_id` = c.`id` WHERE t.`login_name` = #{loginName} AND t.`status` = 'SUCCESS' and c.`coupon_type` = 'RED_ENVELOPE';
